ygData.subject: Re: Fed up with EQ - any ideas??
ygData.msgSnippet: heh ya right.. in AC all the dungeons look the same!  damn great replay value there.. heh AC is like online daggerfall... BIG WORLD... nothing much to
ygData.messageBody:
heh ya right.. in AC all the dungeons look the same!

<laughs!> damn great replay value there.. heh AC is like online
daggerfall... BIG WORLD... nothing much to it... everything looks the same
after a while...

GO BACK TO AC!

The Streak(er)
----- Original Message -----
From: B & H T <thornley@...>
To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 2:48 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Fed up with EQ - any ideas??


> From: "B & H T" <thornley@...>
>
> YOU IDIOTS!!!!!! AC IS BETTER THAN EQ EVER!!!!
>
> Shane Bole wrote:
>
> > From: "Shane Bole" <shane0009@...>
> >
> > yeah in asherons call, I just made new characters sold all the equipment
and
> > got alot of money fast. Its too easy in that game
> >
> > Fammuin, level 16 Erudite Cleric, Erollisi Marr
> > Fabno Licious <Warriors of Apocalypse>, level 22 Erudite Enchanter,
Erollisi
> > Marr
> >

> > > What exactly are you saying here? That you cheated or something to get
> > money? This was in beta right? Sorry but I don't quite follow your
message
> > it looks pretty garbled hehe.. You mean you made new characters and sold
the
> > newbie equipment and did this over and over again?
> > >
> > > - Avron -
> > >
> > >

> > > > lol before I left, I died out somewhere I didnt know and I lost my
plate
> > > > helm. btw im a caster... hehe
> > > > anyways, I set out to find my corpse. then I lost my plate
> > wristbands....
> > > > then i started cursing AC, and I looked around and yelled free stuf,
ran
> > up
> > > > to someone, gave him my breastplate, staff, wand, spell reagents,
and
> > the
> > > > rest of my armor and hes like "wow hehe thanks" and then I said
back to
> > EQ,
> > > > and let him know he can find more plate on the road in a few mins.
> > > > It was so easy to get the plate... exit main character, start a new
> > > > vagabond, sell all the stuff drop the 400 pyreals (thats what theyre
> > called,
> > > > right?) then log in as main character delete vagabond start over. I
got
> > rich
> > > > doing that alot
> > > >

find
> > out
> > > > that
> > > > > the game just sucks.. :) cant put it any other way. Graphics are
> > ok..
> > > > but
> > > > > the world is so large and the distance between them is almost
> > unbearable.
> > > > > Its really annoying running for what seems forever, then losing
your
> > best
> > > > > item you spent all your loot on miles from where you last bound
> > yourself.
> > > > > Hehe.. The AC world is so empty, almost as empty as their
dungeons.
> > :)
> > > > >
> > > > > For those that don't know.. when you die in AC you temporary lose
some
> > of
> > > > > your stat numbers and.. your best item. This item.. which is
now
> > > > > available to anyone walking by. nice aye. EQ example... One
minute
> > you
> > > > > have your rubi tunic, when you return to your corpse you find that
a
> > level
> > > > 1
> > > > > guy is now sporting your hard earned tunic.. Welcome to AC. hehe
